column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The lines are always through the door
column2: spring and fall isn't so bad to wait but winter is a little harsh. My favorite ramen spot because it's not all pork based
column3: you have chicken and vegetarian options from the broth to the protein you use. I myself prefer chicken broth based soups. I've never been disappointed be the appetizers
column4: regular ramen choices or the chef monthly recommendations.
